Sentence.sentence: Morgan said those findings—which included data from the system's 13 community colleges, 27 technical colleges and six universities—were part of the decision not to move forward with Governor Bill Haslam's proposal to privatize management of state buildings in an effort to save money.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The Paris agreement has been widely hailed as a positive step forward in addressing climate change for all,  although the details on addressing climate justice can be best described as sketchy.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Advanced  batteries are moving out of specialized markets and creeping into the mainstream, signaling a tipping point for  forward-looking technologies such as electric cars and rooftop solar panels.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Smith has written a breezy guidebook, with a series of short chapters dedicated to specific aspects of urbanity - parks, say, or the various schemes that have been put forward over the years for building the perfect city.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: That forward thinking strategy is gaining support.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: What does the author say is a forward thinking strategy concerning the reduction of CO2 emissions
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Under the settlement, when no rights holders come forward and register their interest in a work, commercial control automatically reverts to Google.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Well, yeah, around Christmas time there's only one hour of daylight, so you really looks forward to the spring.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: However, when you know you can look forward to working in your dream job, you'll be glad you thought it through.

Sentence.sentence: I look forward to seeing researchers expand our understanding of the issue so we can translate it into effective education and policy.

Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: So I thought it would be wise to take out forward exchange cover to protect our position on the outstanding contract.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: When Elon Musk says that his new priority is using artificial intelligence to build domestic robots, we should look forward to the day in admiration.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: When I re-entered the full-time workforce a few years ago after a decade of solitary self-employment, there was one thing I was looking forward to the most: the opportunity to have work friends once again.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: with the rise of a new concept in urban planning that aims to make life easier and more convenient, however, increasing popularity for urban areas that caused the real estate pushes, in major cities like San Francisco or New York, has inspired a type of f
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: You see it in faculty members who are pleased when their students make a discovery that undermines a cherished theory that they had put forward.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 福沃德职业名称，养猪人，来源于古英语，含义是“猪+管理人”(hog,pig+guardian)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"送出，发送，传送"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: send, deliver, dispatch, forward, ship, transmit
means: send ： 普通最常用词，含义广。指把人或物由一地送往另一地，而不涉及事物的内容或 送的方式。
deliver ： 指把信件、包裹等物寄发出去或交到某地，或直接交与某人，着重发送这一行为。
dispatch ： 指为特殊目的而发送或派遣，强调紧急或快速。
forward ： 指经过其他人或手段把东西转送给某人。
ship ： 把通过水运、陆运或空运等方式运送东西。现常指商业上的运货，或将物品托运。
transmit ： 指将文件、消息等的内容或类似的东西发至某地或传达给他人。

example.en: I'm leaning forward in the saddle for him to write me a good cheerful letter.
example.zh: 我热切渴望他给我写一封很开心的信。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =out of doors, outside 表示"门外,外边,外部的"; 2. 表示"前面,预先"

stems_affixes.word_buile: for门外,外边,外部的+eign→adj.外国的, 外交的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 早的, 迅速的,前进的
stems_affixes.word_buile: for前面,预先+ward表方向→前进,向前[的,地]
for门外,外边,外部的+th→adv.向前;向外,往外;以后
for前面,预先+ward表方向→前进,向前[的,地]
foreign外国的+er人→n.外国人, 外地人
for门外,外边,外部的+est存在→在外头,野外→森林
forest[n.森林;森林地带]+er人→n.林务官, 森林人
for前面,预先+ward表方向→前进,向前[的,地]

word_mean: 前倾槽，forward-tilting trough  对流层中, 高空槽线位于低空槽线之前的槽。

Sentence.sentence: Adolescents enter high school with great excitement but are soon looking forward to graduation.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷1 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: But when no one else came forward, Taylor ran to Paris and began doing CPR, "It was scary."
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Clarity of thoughts can help you move forward.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Determined to be myself, move forward, free of shame and worldly labels, I can now call myself a "marathon winner".
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: For most of the last century, the car represented what it meant to be American—going forward at high speed to find new worlds.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: He was already looking forward to practicing the new music.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: However, the 1995 pop song 'common people' puts forward the view that though a middle-class person may 'want to live like common people' they can never appreciate the reality of a working-class life.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语广东卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: I've been looking forward to this training program for a long time.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sarah thomas is looking forward to challenge of her new A-level course.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: She said, "we don't have any idea who put grandma forward.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Solving the safety problem well enough to move forward in AI seems to be possible but not easy.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: The manager put forward a suggestion that we should have an assistant.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The proposal put forward by Dobrindt aims to help promote fully automatic driving.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 题设

Sentence.sentence: Coinciding with the groundbreaking theory of biological evolution proposed by British naturalist Charles Darwin in the 1860s, British social philosopher Herbert Spencer put forward his own theory of biological and cultural evolution.
Sentence.come: 出自-2009年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: You might even be tempted to assume that humanity has little future to look forward to.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: John Ioannidis, a physician who studies research methodology, says that the policy is “a most welcome step forward” and “long overdue.”
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The court’s ruling is a step forward in the struggle against both corruption and official favoritism.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The court's ruling is a step forward in the struggle against both corruption and official favoritism.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: We still have a long way to go to get back to full employment, but at least we are now finally moving forward at a faster pace.
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: When our time of mourning is over, we press forward, stronger with a greater understanding and respect for life.
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

sentences.en: I won't go there again from this time forward.
sentences.cn: 以后我再也不去那儿了。

向前方的, 向前进的; 位于前面的

sentences.en: He is very forward for his age.
sentences.cn: 就其年龄而言, 他很早熟。

sentence.cn: 但是，1995年的流行歌曲“平民百姓”提出了这样一种观点，即尽管中产阶级可能“想像普通人一样生活”，但他们永远无法真正领略工人阶级生活的现实。

entry.def: If you move or look forward, you move or look in a direction that is in front of you. In British English, you can also move or look forwards .

example.ex: He came forward with his hand out. 'Mr and Mrs Selby?' he enquired...
example.tran: 他走上前去伸出手来。“是塞尔比先生和夫人吗？”他问道。

example.ex: She fell forwards on to her face...

entry.def: Forward means in a position near the front of something such as a building or a vehicle.

example.ex: The best seats are in the aisle and as far forward as possible...
example.tran: 最好的座位在过道处，越靠前越好。

example.ex: The other car had a 3-inch lower driving seat and had its engine mounted further forward.
example.tran: 另外一辆车的驾驶座椅低了3英寸，引擎更加靠前。

entry.def: If one thing is forward of another, especially on a ship or aircraft, the first thing is in front of the second thing or further ahead.
entry.tran: (尤指在轮船或飞机上)靠近…前面的，在…前面的

example.ex: Forward of the main cabin are the guest cabins...
Sixty-one small parachute symbols were painted on the left side just forward of the wing.
example.tran: 61 个小降落伞的标志被绘在左翼的正前面。

entry.def: If you say that someone looks forward, you approve of them because they think about what will happen in the future and plan for it. In British English, you can also say that someone looks forwards .

example.ex: Now the leadership wants to look forward, and to outline a strategy for the rest of the century...
example.tran: 现在领导层想要展望未来，为本世纪余下的时间勾画出战略纲要。

example.ex: People should forget and look forwards...
example.tran: 人们应该忘记过去向前看。

entry.def: If you put a clock or watch forward, you change the time shown on it so that it shows a later time, for example when the time changes to summer time or daylight saving time.

example.ex: When we put the clocks forward in March we go into British Summer Time.
example.tran: 我们3月份把表调快时，就进入了英国夏令时。

entry.def: When you are referring to a particular time, if you say that something was true from that time forward, you mean that it became true at that time, and continued to be true afterwards.

example.ex: Velazquez's work from that time forward was confined largely to portraits of the royal family.
example.tran: 委拉斯开兹的作品从那时起大多局限于皇室成员画像。

entry.def: You use forward to indicate that something progresses or improves. In British English, you can also use forwards .
entry.tran: 向前地;前进地;有进展地

example.ex: And by boosting economic prosperity in Mexico, Canada and the United States, it will help us move forward on issues that concern all of us...
example.tran: 促进墨西哥、加拿大和美国的经济繁荣将有助于解决与我们大家息息相关的诸多问题。

example.ex: They just couldn't see any way forward...
example.tran: 他们就是看不到前进的方向。

entry.def: If you forward something, you cause it to progress or improve.

example.ex: The music is used to forward the plot, not simply to keep the toes tapping.
example.tran: 音乐用来推进情节发展，而不仅仅是保持节奏感。

example.ex: ...the scientist who has done the most to forward the cause of public understanding over the year.
example.tran: 这位一年来为促进公众理解作出巨大贡献的科学家

entry.def: If something or someone is put forward, or comes forward, they are suggested or offered as suitable for a particular purpose.

example.ex: Over the years several similar theories have been put forward...
example.tran: 几年来已经有好几个类似理论相继提出。

example.ex: Next month the Commission is to bring forward its first proposals for action...
example.tran: 下月该委员会将提出它的首批行动建议。

entry.def: If a letter or message is forwarded to someone, it is sent to the place where they are, after having been sent to a different place earlier.

example.ex: When he's out on the road, office calls are forwarded to the cellular phone in his truck...
example.tran: 他在路上时，打到办公室的电话会转接到卡车里的移动电话上。

example.ex: We will forward your letters to him.
example.tran: 我们会把您的信转交给他。

entry.def: If you describe someone as forward, you mean that they speak very confidently and honestly but they do not always show enough respect for the person they are talking to.

example.ex: He's very forward and confident and chats happily to other people.
example.tran: 他很自以为是，喜欢和别人攀谈。

entry.def: In football, basketball, or hockey, a forward is a player whose usual position is in the opponents' half of the field, and whose usual job is to attack or score goals.
entry.tran: (足球、篮球或曲棍球等运动的)前锋

means.word_mean: 1. the person who plays the position of forward on a basketball team
2. a position on a basketball team
1. send or ship onward from an intermediate post or station in transit;
1. at or near or directed toward the front;
3. used of temperament or behavior; lacking restraint or modesty;

sentences.sentence: "a forward child badly in need of discipline"

means.word_mean: 4. of the transmission gear causing forward movement in a motor vehicle;
6. situated at or toward the front;
1. at or to or toward the front;

sentences.sentence: "she practiced sewing backward as well as frontward on her new sewing machine"; (`forrad' and `forrard' are dialectal variations)

means.word_mean: 2. forward in time or order or degree;
3. toward the future; forward in time;

sentences.sentence: "I like to look ahead in imagination to what the future may bring"
"they went slowly forward in the mud"

means.word_mean: 5. near or toward the bow of a ship or cockpit of a plane;

sentences.sentence: "the captain went fore (or forward) to check the instruments"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English forweard (in the sense 'towards the future', as in from this day forward), variant of forthweard (see forth, -ward)

sentences.cn: 向前两步走!
sentences.en: Take two paces forward!

sentences.en: Shirley leaned forwards on the table, her taper fingers interlaced and compressing each other hard.

sentences.cn: 他大叫,要他们向前进.
sentences.en: He shouted for them to go forward.

sentences.cn: 向前划水, 向前呼吸,向前入水, 向前踢腿.
sentences.en: Pull forward, breathe forward, land forward and kick forward.

sentences.cn: 很多时候, 我们向前走时最先要战胜的是自己.
sentences.en: Very often, we have to conquer ourselves first when marching forward.

sentences.cn: 然后, 左腿抬起, 尽量远伸, 腿跟向前伸, 脚尖向后勾.
sentences.en: Then, leg lifting, extending further far as possible, leg extending forward, tip of toe drawing backward.

sentences.cn: 她向前跌去,然后就消失在灌木丛中.
sentences.en: She pitched forward and vanished among the shrubs.

sentences.cn: 请稍稍向前弓一下身.
sentences.en: Just lean forward for a moment , please.
